title: Unlock Funding for Your Career: PRS Foundation Webinar
description: Join The Ivors Academy and PRS Foundation to learn about grants and funding available to support your work.

title: Council of Music Makers (CMM): Fix Streaming Webinar
description: A webinar discussing the economics of music streaming, organized by the Council Of Music Makers.

title: The Ivors Academy Summit
description: A flagship summit to equip songwriters and composers with practical knowledge, tools, and connections to build and sustain successful careers.

title: The Ivors with Amazon Music 2025
description: The most prestigious celebration of songwriting and screen composition.

title: Ivors Academy Honours 2025
description: An awards ceremony celebrating exceptional individuals from across music who champion the songwriter and composer community.

title: Composing for Film and TV: A Masterclass
description: An in-depth session on how to break into composing for film and TV, featuring top composers.

title: Understanding Music Copyright
description: A comprehensive webinar that explores the fundamentals of music copyright law and how it affects artists.

title: Digital Distribution for Musicians
description: Learn how to distribute your music digitally on platforms like Spotify, Apple Music, and more.

title: Music Marketing: How to Promote Your Release
description: Gain valuable insights on how to effectively market your music to grow your audience and increase streams.

title: Songwriting for Beginners: Tips and Tricks
description: A beginner-friendly webinar on how to start writing songs and refine your craft as a songwriter.

title: Advanced Music Production Techniques
description: This webinar will dive into advanced techniques for producing high-quality music, from sound design to mixing.

title: Music Licensing 101
description: Learn the basics of music licensing and how to get your music placed in films, TV shows, and commercials.

title: Mastering the Art of Live Performance
description: Learn how to improve your live performances and connect with audiences, featuring professional live musicians.

title: The Future of Music Technology
description: A deep dive into the innovations shaping the future of music production and performance.

title: Producing Music for Video Games
description: A special webinar focusing on how to create music specifically for video game soundtracks and scores.

title: The Business of Music: How to Get Paid
description: A guide to understanding the business side of music, from royalties to licensing and everything in between.

title: Networking for Musicians
description: Learn how to build your network as a musician, from industry professionals to fellow artists.

title: The Evolution of Music Genres
description: An exploration of how different music genres have evolved over time and what it means for modern artists.

title: Virtual Music Collaboration Tools
description: A webinar on how to collaborate with other musicians remotely using the latest virtual tools and software.
